oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb al-Wasāyil ilá maʻrifat al-awāyil / lil-ʻAllāmah Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī : manuscript, 1509
Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Suyūṭī , 1445-1505
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Naẓmī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Rafīʻ ibn Muḥammad (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 17 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. Comments in the margins.
According to the colophon (f. 77v), copy completed on 27 Muḥarram 915 AH [May 17, 1509 AD].
A collation note on f. 77v dated Rajab 1081 AH [November 14, 1670 AD].
Ownership statements signed Sayf al-Dīn Abū al-Nūr al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Rafīʻ ibn Shaykh Muḥammad al-Naẓmī, 1129 AH [1717 AD], Waḥdatī and Aḥmad al-Dhihnī,
Two seals signed Muṣṭafá Dāyahʻzādah and Raḥmī.
A reading note (f. 77v) by Raḥmī al-Girīdī ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd in Edirne in 1307 (?) AH [1889-90 AD].
MS Arab 361. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islam--Miscellanea
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: وسائل الى المعرفة الاوائل
كتاب الوسايل الى معرفة الاوايل / للعلامة جلال الدين السيوطي : مخطوطة، 1509
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: نظمي، عبد الرحمن رفيع بن محمد، (former owner.)
